page.title: 01Farms in this area.
page.content: There are many{farms}in{ {Threemilestone. They are mostly mixed farms.The farms are mainly named after their owners. They mostly have sheep, cows, pigs, horses and other livestock. Most of the farms have got a certain aspect on farming: some are crops, animals or just hay or silage to sell to other farmers.Some farms have milking cows and we have got twenty_nine farms aproximately in our area.Most of our area is land.Most of our group have some relatives on a{farm.}The owners of{Westleigh Farm}give jobs to mentally handicapped people on the farm,which is a very good idea, the farming group think. We have found out about many types of farms and ways of working on a farm.
